name: Twee Tussle
description:
A 1 vs 1 fighting game with good mobility, great variety of attack skills, simple guard and perfect guard (parry mechanic), limited use items and ultimate skills. All of this comes with a charming and colorful aesthetic, wich will contrast with the violence/gore of the bloody fight. The length of the fight will be decided by the amount of lives that the players decided plus a time limit, where each player will choose his own character.

If you want to give us your opinions you are more than welcome to do so in this form :

Form here!
